actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to establish a grant program for the acquisition of medical equipment and supplies for the treatment of aircraft accident burn victims.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, acting through the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration, to make grants to hospitals near air carrier airports for acquisition of medical equipment and supplies to treat aircraft accident burn victims.

titles.title: A bill to establish a grant program for the acquisition of medical equipment and supplies for the treatment of aircraft accident burn victims.
